languages.text: {n}Абеляр багровеет.{/n} "Проклятый предатель успел добраться до Даргонуса раньше нас и теперь орудует там, не опасаясь последствий! Не удивлюсь, если во всем этом ему помогает колдовство — никак иначе не объяснить, что он пробрался к миру так быстро!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Абеляр багровеет.{/n} "Проклятый предатель успел добраться до Даргонуса раньше нас и теперь орудует там, не опасаясь последствий! Не удивлюсь, если во всем этом ему помогает колдовство — никак иначе не объяснить, что он пробрался к миру так быстро!"

languages.text: {n}Abelard's face turns a deep puce.{/n} "That blasted traitor beat us to Dargonus and is now free to act with impunity! It would not surprise me to find out that this was the work of sorcery — how else could he have reached the world in such a short time?"
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр багровеет.{/n} "Проклятый предатель успел добраться до Даргонуса раньше нас и теперь орудует там, не опасаясь последствий! Не удивлюсь, если во всем этом ему помогает колдовство — никак иначе не объяснить, что он пробрался к миру так быстро!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard's face turns a deep red.{/n} "That blasted traitor beat us to Dargonus and is now free to act with impunity! It would not surprise me to find out that this had been the work of witchcraft — how else could he have reached the world in such a short time?"

{n}Abelard's face turns a deep red.{/n} "That blasted traitor beat us to Dargonus and is now free to act with impunity! It would not surprise me to find out that this had been the work of witchcraft — how else could he have reached the world in such a short time?"

{n}Abelard's face turns a deep puce.{/n} "That blasted traitor beat us to Dargonus and is now free to act with impunity! It would not surprise me to find out that this was the work of sorcery — how else could he have reached the world in such a short time?"

{n}Abelard's face turns a deep puce.{/n} "That blasted traitor beat us to Dargonus and is now free to act with impunity! It would not surprise me to find out that this was the work of sorcery — how else could he have reached the world in such a short time?"

{n}Abelard's face turns a deep puce.{/n} "That blasted traitor beat us to Dargonus and is now free to act with impunity! It would not surprise me to find out that this was the work of sorcery — how else could he have reached the world in such a short time?"

languages.text: {n}アベラルドの顔は深い赤色に染まる。{/n}「あの忌々しい裏切り者がダルゴナスに先んじて到達し、今や好き放題に行動しているとは！これが魔術の仕業だあったとしても驚きません。それ以外にどのようにしてこんな短時間でこの世界に到達できたと言うのです？」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's face turns a deep puce.{/n} "That blasted traitor beat us to Dargonus and is now free to act with impunity! It would not surprise me to find out that this was the work of sorcery — how else could he have reached the world in such a short time?"

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドの顔は深い赤色に染まる。{/n}「あの忌々しい裏切り者がダルゴナスに先んじて到達し、今では免責で自由に行動できるようになっていると！これが魔法の仕業だとわかっても驚きません。それ以外にどのようにしてこんな短時間でこの世界に到達できたと言うのです？」

languages.text: {n}Le visage d'Abélard tourne au cramoisi.{/n} « Ce maudit traître est arrivé avant nous sur Dargonus et peut désormais agir en toute impunité ! Je ne serais pas étonné d'apprendre qu'il a eu recours à la sorcellerie, comment aurait-il pu atteindre la planète aussi rapidement, autrement ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's face turns a deep puce.{/n} "That blasted traitor beat us to Dargonus and is now free to act with impunity! It would not surprise me to find out that this was the work of sorcery — how else could he have reached the world in such a short time?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage d'Abélard tourne au cramoisi.{/n} « Ce maudit traître est arrivé avant nous sur Dargonus et peut désormais agir en toute impunité ! Je ne serais pas étonné d'apprendre qu'il a eu recours à la sorcellerie, comment aurait-il pu atteindre la planète aussi rapidement, autrement ? »

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德的脸涨成了深紫色。{/n}“那个该死的叛徒抢先我们一步去了达戈努斯，现在居然还在逍遥法外！就算我发现他投靠了巫术的力量，我也不会感到意外。若非如此，他怎么可能在这么短的时间内就到了这个世界？”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's face turns a deep puce.{/n} "That blasted traitor beat us to Dargonus and is now free to act with impunity! It would not surprise me to find out that this was the work of sorcery — how else could he have reached the world in such a short time?"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德的脸涨成了深紫色。{/n}“那个该死的叛徒抢先我们一步去了达戈努斯，现在居然还在逍遥法外！就算我发现他投靠了巫术的力量，我也不会感到意外。若非如此，他怎么可能在这么短的时间内就到了这个世界？”

languages.text: {n}El rostro de Abelard adquiere un intenso color morado.{/n} «¡Ese traidor nos arrastró hasta Dargonus y ahora es libre de hacer lo que le venga en gana! No me extrañaría que fuera obra de hechicería; ¿cómo si no podría haber llegado a ese mundo en tan poco tiempo?».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's face turns a deep puce.{/n} "That blasted traitor beat us to Dargonus and is now free to act with impunity! It would not surprise me to find out that this was the work of sorcery — how else could he have reached the world in such a short time?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro de Abelard adquiere un intenso color morado.{/n} «¡Ese traidor nos arrastró hasta Dargonus y ahora es libre de hacer lo que le venga en gana! No me extrañaría que fuera obra de hechicería; ¿cómo si no podría haber llegado a ese mundo en tan poco tiempo?».

languages.text: {n}Abelards Gesicht verfärbt sich tiefrot.{/n} "Dieser verfluchte Verräter war vor uns auf Dargonus und kann nun ungestraft walten! Ich würde mich nicht wundern, wenn hier Hexerei im Spiel war. Wie sonst hätte er die Welt in so kurzer Zeit erreichen können?"
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's face turns a deep puce.{/n} "That blasted traitor beat us to Dargonus and is now free to act with impunity! It would not surprise me to find out that this was the work of sorcery — how else could he have reached the world in such a short time?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelards Gesicht verfärbt sich tiefrot.{/n} "Dieser verfluchte Verräter war vor uns auf Dargonus und kann nun ungestraft walten! Ich würde mich nicht wundern, wenn hier Hexerei im Spiel war. Wie sonst hätte er die Welt in so kurzer Zeit erreichen können?"

languages.text: {n}Abelard'ın yüzü morarıyor.{/n} "Kahrolası hain önce Dargonus'ta önümüze geçti, şimdi de bedel ödemeden istediği gibi hareket ediyor! Bu işte bir büyü olduğunu öğrensem şaşırmam, dünyaya bu kadar kısa sürede başka nasıl ulaşmış olabilir ki?"
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's face turns a deep puce.{/n} "That blasted traitor beat us to Dargonus and is now free to act with impunity! It would not surprise me to find out that this was the work of sorcery — how else could he have reached the world in such a short time?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard'ın yüzü morarıyor.{/n} "O kahrolası hain önce Dargonus'ta önümüze geçti, şimdi de yaptıklarının bedelini ödemeden özgürce hareket ediyor! Bu işte bir büyü olduğunu öğrensem şaşırmam, dünyaya bu kadar kısa sürede başka nasıl ulaşmış olabilir ki?"
